body.p:
Pleasureville Henry
cty Ky. --
To his Excellency, Thos. E Bramlett, Governor of Ky

Sir my name having been used, without my consent, at Pleasureville precinct, as a candidate for Justice of the peace for said precinct, and having been elected; I deem it duty to inform your excellency that I cannot acept the office --

Your obt. servt.
John A. Reed

J. A. Reed, having declined accepting the office above named your Excellency will please commission, immediately, a well qualified gentleman of our precinct who will accept J. R. Lyle who who will accpt -- Respectfully

Thos. J. Hall,
Acting Justice for
Pleasureville District

Henry Co
Justice Peace
J. R. Lyle
apptd
3d Oct/64
